title: resellersolutions
author: resellersolutions
created_time: June 13, 2022, 12:55:16 AMLast edit: June 21, 2022, 02:59:19 AM by resellersolutions
content: We currently have 8 USA shelf companies for sale. We provide a USA formation service that competes with Stripe Atlas and as such all companies and accounts are created legally by us. All companies are either S-corp or C-corp and have clean EIN and DUNS information. Included in the package: Articles of IncorporationEIN Original SS-4 PDFCorporate bank account in company name can issue unlimited VCCOnline banking login and 2FADirectors resolutionConsent to be directors formCompany BylawsStock Share CertificateRegistered agent service and USA address will be provided up to one year from filing date listed on the articles. https://i.imgur.com/B159yPK.pngAll documents are legally prepared and could be submitted to banks in the event you`d like to apply for banking services or sign up for a payment service like Stripe or Marketplace seller account like Amazon or Ebay.No documentation required, only the name of the individual who will taking over as director as we need to create a new Directors Resolution.Documents, account and login information delivered instantly.Price: $130 including bank account. $160 with bank account and verified Payoneer account.Name change services can be provided at extra cost.Most Crypto and credit/debit card payments accepted.For more information and support request.@resellersolutionshttps://t.me/Resellersolutions

comments.author: Behat1981

comments.author: resellersolutions
comments.body: Yes you will receive the company and all documents listed plus the bank account for $130. Right now we have one Colorado company available for this week as the other 3 we had in stock have been sold. comments.author: u80huc
comments.body: Our firm provide the following service:- Company formation: US, UK, EU/EEA, HongKong, China- KYC service: Chinese and Eastern Europeans/CIS countries, EU, US- Payment processing consultancy: MUILTI-IBAN, US corprate bank, EMI- Ecom Account: ebay business, walmart business, amazon business (ALL REAL CORP ACCOUNT)We can consider to do a job for moderator or old member for free or at a discount in exchange of ads or vouch.Thank youContactu80huc@protonmail.comhttps://t.me/oxabeakertelegram   oxabeaker
